DOC.brief_summary: International Observational E-Registry use osmotic dilator DILAPAN-S® / DILASOFT® cervical priming prior induced abortion .
DOC.detailed_description: International , multicentre , non-interventional , observational e-registry , post market clinical follow study document current clinical use Dilapan-S Dilasoft cervical priming induced abortion regard number dilator use , duration insertion dilator situ unusual complication consequent use .
DOC.criteria: Intrauterine pregnancy ≥ 6 ≤ 24 week gestation Patients capable give consent sign form Abortion make compliance Abortion Act 1967 ( For England , Wales Scotland ) Clinical sign uterine , vaginal vulvar infection Acute bleeding
